# SqlStringGenerator.GenerateUpdateSqlString method

Method that generates UPDATE statement

```csharp
internal static string GenerateUpdateSqlString(string[] columnNames, string[] values, 
    string TableName)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| columnNames | names of the columns in the database |
| values | values from original source |
| TableName | name of table in database |

## Return Value

generated UPDATE string
